hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Service_base_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: unique infrastructure value that previously was used when ssn being provisioned

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DataLake_enable
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provision DataLake storage instead of Blob storage

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SSH_Key_Name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: name of the uploaded ssh key file (without ".pem")

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SSN_SG_names
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The names of the SSN Security Group to be accessible

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: vpc_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of VPC where infrastructure is being deployed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: subnet_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the public subnet where EDGE will be deployed

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: instance_shape
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: value of the EDGE EC2 instance shape

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Region
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Azure region where infrastructure was deployed

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rand=`openssl rand -hex 10`; sed 's/RID/'${rand}'/g' /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/create_edge_node/template.json | sed 's/SBN/'${Service_base_name}'/g' | sed 's/UN/'${Username}'/g' | sed 's/COF/'${os_family}'/g' | sed 's/ARGN/'${Resource_group_name}'/g' | sed 's/KN/'${SSH_Key_Name}'/g' | sed 's/CREG/'${Region}'/g' | sed 's/EVI/'${vpc_name}'/g' | sed 's/CSI/'${subnet_name}'/g' | sed 's/EIS/'${instance_shape}'/g' | sed 's/DLE/'${DataLake_enable}'/g' | sudo docker run -i -v /home/dlab-user/keys:/root/keys -v /opt/dlab/tmp/result:/response -v /var/opt/dlab/log/edge:/logs/edge docker.dlab-edge --action $Action ;
